an3.87:1.1: “Sadhikamidam, bhikkhave, diyaddhasikkhapadasatam anvaddhamasam uddesam agacchati yattha attakama kulaputta sikkhanti.
an3.87:1.2: Tisso ima, bhikkhave, sikkha yatthetam sabbam samodhanam gacchati.
an3.87:1.5: ima kho, bhikkhave, tisso sikkha yatthetam sabbam samodhanam gacchati.
an3.87:2.1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim mattaso kari pannaya mattaso kari.
an3.87:2.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.87:2.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.87:2.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.87:2.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sattakkhattuparamo hoti.
an3.87:2.7: Sattakkhattuparamam deve ca manusse ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.87:2.8: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya kolankolo hoti, dve va tini va kulani sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.87:2.9: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ekabiji hoti, ekamyeva manusakam bhavam nibbattetva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.87:2.10: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.87:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim paripurakari pannaya mattaso kari.
an3.87:3.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.87:3.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.87:3.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.87:3.6: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya uddhamsoto akanitthagami.
an3.87:3.7: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an3.87:3.8: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an3.87:3.9: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya upahaccaparinibbayi hoti.
an3.87:3.10: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti.
an3.87:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim paripurakari pannaya paripurakari.
an3.87:4.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.87:4.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.87:4.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani, tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.87:4.6: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an3.87:5.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, padesam padesakari aradheti, paripuram paripurakari, avanjhani tvevaham, bhikkhave, sikkhapadani vadami”ti.
